sentences.sentence: A divine work! Athens, diviner yet.
sentences.translation: 天赐神工！而雅典，更其神圣。

sentences.sentence: Why not get a diviner to expound my dream?
sentences.translation: 为什么不去叫一个占卜者来解释我的梦呢？

sentences.sentence: I am a skilled Diviner. Amongst other things. And I have seen your coming.
sentences.translation: 抛去其它的事不管，我毕竟是一个老练的神术师。
